CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 23, 1957, pg. 20, reads: "Best Sportsman - Carl Jordan, shown receiving award, didn't win the welter-weight championship in the senior open division of the Golden Gloves. However, he put up such a good fight against winner Jimmy Chavis he was presented the sportsmanship award for the tournament. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Man awarding good sportsmanship trophy to Golden Gloves boxer Carl Jordan in Pitt Field House
